Posts.Content: Thanks! I am now told I need a mammogram. I had a baby about 18 months ago and the milk isn't drying up so they are worried. Should I be worried?
Posts.Title: Need help please!

Posts.Content: so I went to the docs yesterday and they found a few lumps on my left breasts. I have an ultra sound scheduled for tuesday to see what is going on. does this mean something is wrong? anyone ever been through this before???
Posts.Title: Need help please!

Posts.Content: Thanks! I guess what I want to ask is if my dad's mother had it , cna it be passed on to me? I have to have an ultra sound and a mommagram and I am totally freaking out! how are you doing now?
Posts.Title: question about breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks girls! I had a daughter about 18 months ago and still have milk or whatever coming out. They tell me that's not normal and that's why they want me to get a mammogram! at first they just wanted an ultra sound cause the doc found what she thought was densed tissue. I go in for all this on the 3rd of march which is going to seem like forever.
Posts.Title: question about breast cancer

Posts.Content: my doctor asked me if anyone in my family has ever had breast cancer and I said yes my grandmother on my fathers side and they said it didn't matter on the fathers side. Then i was told that wasn't true! Does anyone know?
